create.name: Sunny Days Orphanage
create.description: Sunny Days Orphanage offers a nurturing and caring environment for children in need. With dedicated staff and a focus on personal growth, we provide opportunities for education, recreation, and emotional support to help every child thrive.
create.opening_hours: Monday to Friday: 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM, Saturday: 9:00 AM - 1:00 PM

duplicate.name: Hope Haven
duplicate.description: At Hope Haven, we are committed to offering hope and support to orphaned and vulnerable children. Our mission is to create a safe, family-like atmosphere where children can heal, grow, and build the confidence they need to face the world with optimism.
duplicate.opening_hours: Monday to Friday: 7:30 AM - 5:30 PM, Sunday: 10:00 AM - 2:00 PM

map.name: Little Hearts Orphanage
map.description: Little Hearts Orphanage is dedicated to providing a loving and supportive home for children who have experienced loss and hardship. We focus on emotional healing and personal development, ensuring that each child feels safe, valued, and prepared for a brighter future.
map.opening_hours: Monday to Friday: 8:00 AM - 7:00 PM, Saturday: 8:30 AM - 12:30 PM

required.name: Bright Future Orphanage
required.description: Bright Future Orphanage is committed to helping children build a bright and successful future. We offer a wide range of educational and extracurricular activities that promote learning, creativity, and social development, all within a safe and supportive environment.
required.opening_hours: Monday to Friday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM, Saturday and Sunday: Closed
